longBusinessSummary: GSDT Fintech Group Inc. provides engineering, logistics, information technology, and security services. It offers engineering and installation services in the areas of rapid deployment teams, computer/communications systems, fiber optic and category 5e/6 infrastructure cabling, inside and outside cable plant, automated monitoring systems, documentation, and ATG installation and maintenance; and information technology services in the areas of software engineering, large scale business applications, LAN and WAN network engineering, virtual private networks, system testing and quality assurance inspections, and documentation. The company also provides biometric applications for secure identity management. It serves government, corporate, and individual customers. The company was formerly known as The Evermedia Group, Inc. and changed its name to GSDT Fintech Group Inc. in November 2020. GSDT Fintech Group Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.
